bill.summary:
Strengthening our Military Assets by Researching Technology to Better Assure Security and Efficiency Act or the SMART BASE Act
This bill directs the Department of Defense to report to Congress on the effects of using smart technology (i.e., interconnected devices and appliances that rely on technologies such as automation, artificial intelligence, and wireless communications) on military installations.
